info.name: Labour Slave
info.description: Background for a slave kept as some kind of labourer.
info.author: T'Ho'Tep

description.p: Captured and imprisoned by a group of nefarious people. Due to either deception or actual skill, you convince them to keep you alive as you could be useful. After spending a significant amount of time as a prisoner you break free or are released. With a new found appreciation of your own freedom will you seek vengeance or seek to help others having been in peril yourself.

Skill Proficiencies: Two of your choice: Animal Handling, Athletics, Deception, Performance, Survival
Tool Proficiencies: One type of artisan tool.
Language Proficiencies: The language of your captors.
Equipment: Tool of your trade, a set of common clothes.

setters.set: Animal Handling, Athletics, Deception, Performance, Survival, Tool and language.

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: Others will suffer as I have.
I will have vengeance on the ones who imprisoned me.
My freedom has made me appreciate the beauty in the world.
No one should suffer as I have.
I am owed a great debt due to my years of imprisonment. I will take what I am owed from anyone.
I will not be captured again. I would rather die.
I am used to being told what to do.
No one controls me anymore.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Loss: I freely give those who offend me what was so brutally denied me, death. (Chaos)
Dedication: I never betray those who trust me. (Law)
Vengeance: People will pay for my imprisonment. It does not matter who. (Evil)
Redemption: Everyone deserves a second chance. (Good)
Resilience: I can survive any challenge. (Any)
Leadership: Everyone has an equal say.

select.name: Bond
select.item: I take up arms to help establish a free world.
The horrors of my time in imprisonment haunt my dreams, only after a day of hard work can I find sleep.
I am indebted to those who freed me from prison, I will repay this debt.
My torturer survived the attack that set me free, I will find him/her.
I will not rest while others suffer fates similar to mine.
I am searching for a way to heal myself, both physically and emotionally.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I follow orders too readily.
I fear to act sometimes when I know I should.
I undervalue myself.
I folded under the torture, and gave information that I promised would be kept secret. My life would be in jeopardy if others found out.
Survival is worth more than friendship.
The ghosts from my past hinder my actions.

description.p: Meek and unassuming, you are able to blend in the background by appearing unimportant.
